name: santander-product-recommendation
data_intro: Can you pair products with people?

cat_feature_intro.fecha_dato: The table is partitioned for this column
cat_feature_intro.ind_empleado: Employee index: A active, B ex employed, F filial, N not employee, P pasive
cat_feature_intro.fecha_alta: The date in which the customer became as the first holder of a contract in the bank
cat_feature_intro.ult_fec_cli_1t: Last date as primary customer (if he isn't at the end of the month)
cat_feature_intro.tiprel_1mes: Customer relation type at the beginning of the month, A (active), I (inactive), P (former customer),R (Potential)
cat_feature_intro.indresi: Residence index (S (Yes) or N (No) if the residence country is the same than the bank country)
cat_feature_intro.indext: Foreigner index (S (Yes) or N (No) if the customer's birth country is different than the bank country)
cat_feature_intro.conyuemp: Spouse index. 1 if the customer is spouse of an employee
cat_feature_intro.canal_entrada: channel used by the customer to join
cat_feature_intro.ind_nuevo: New customer Index. 1 if the customer registered in the last 6 months.
cat_feature_intro.indrel: 1 (First/Primary), 99 (Primary customer during the month but not at the end of the month)
cat_feature_intro.indrel_1mes: Customer type at the beginning of the month ,1 (First/Primary customer), 2 (co-owner ),P (Potential),3 (former primary), 4(former co-owner)
cat_feature_intro.ind_actividad_cliente: Activity index (1, active customer; 0, inactive customer)
